glsl:
#ifdef GL_ES
precision highp float;
#endif
#define PI 3.14159265358979323
#define POW2(X) X*X
#define POW3(X) X*X*X
uniform sampler2D from,to;uniform float progress;uniform vec2 resolution;uniform int endx,endy;float j(vec2 a){return fract(sin(dot(a.xy,vec2(12.9898,78.233)))*43758.5453);}vec2 k(vec2 a,float b){return vec2(cos(b)*a.x-sin(b)*a.y,sin(b)*a.x+cos(b)*a.y);}float l(float a){return -cos(a*PI)/2.+.5;}void main(){vec2 a,b,f,g;a=gl_FragCoord.xy/resolution.xy-.5;b=a;float c,d,e;c=progress*2.-1.;d=-(c*c*2.)+3.;e=abs(d);b*=e;b+=mix(vec2(.5),vec2(float(endx)+.5,float(endy)+.5),POW2(l(progress)));f=mod(b,1.);g=b;bool h=int(floor(g.x))==endx&&int(floor(g.y))==endy;if(!h){float i=float(j(floor(g))*4.)*.5*PI;f=vec2(.5)+k(f-vec2(.5),i);}if(h||j(floor(g))>.5)gl_FragColor=texture2D(from,f);else gl_FragColor=texture2D(to,f);}
